main-ingredients.name: Meat
tips: For a quick meal, you should pick a relatively thin cut and possibly one that you're comfortable with, e.g. a steak, pork chops or chicken breast.
Consider buying meat fresh and if possible, from a local butcher.
Specially with meat, only buy what you need and use it within a few days.

main-ingredients.name: Fish
tips: For a quick meal, you should pick a piece that is relatively easy to prepare and possibly one that you're confortable with.
Consider buying fish fresh and if possible, from a local fishmonger.
Specially with fish, only buy what you need and use it within a few days.

main-ingredients.name: Potato wedges
tips: Potato wedges can be made with a variety of different spices and sauces.

garnish.name: Mix of various vegetables
tips: E.g. tomatos, bellpeppers, carrots, potatoes, onions or other, ideally seasonal, vegetables can be cooked together.

garnish.name: Pasta
tips: A single type of pasta can get boring very quickly. Try using different pasta types.

fast-food.name: Fish fingers
tips: If prepared in the oven, fish fingers can be made with a potion of french fries.

fast-food.name: Chicken nuggets
tips: If prepared in the oven, chicken nuggets can be made with a potion of french fries.

fast-food.name: Croquettes
tips: Due to different preparation techniques, some croquettes might not be vegan.
If prepared in the oven, croquettes can be made with a potion of french fries.

fast-food.name: Baked fish
tips: If prepared in the oven, baked fish can be made with a potion of french fries.

restaurants.name: Fast food
tips: Fast food restaurants don't tend to have a wide selection of vegetarian or vegan food. If required, please make sure that they're offering enough alternatives.

restaurants.name: Burger
tips: Burger restaurants don't tend to have a wide selection of vegetarian or vegan food. If required, please make sure that they're offering enough alternatives.

restaurants.name: Greek restaurant
tips: Greek restaurants don't tend to have a wide selection of vegetarian or vegan food. If required, please make sure that they're offering enough alternatives.
